description:
Known to mechanics as the 4th hand, this cable stretcher pulls cables tight to adjust derailleurs and brakes. Easy one-hand operation, with a thumb lock to hold the cable tight while you tighten bolts and nuts.

  • Made of chrome-plated, heat-treated steel
  • Cushion grips for comfort
  • Thumb lock for one-handed operation
name: Park Tool BT-2 Cable Stretcher
